evaluationAll.title: Consult all evaluations
evaluationAll.layoutSubtitle: Select a year to consult all the evaluations of that year. Please note that this is a heavy process and it could take a few minutes.

excel.title: If you wish, you can also download the results as an Excel file.
excel.downloading: The request is been processing. This process could take a few minutes, please don't close or refresh the browser window.
